name: Baltimore City GIS REST Services
description: Listing of ArcGIS REST Services providing access to geospatial data for Baltimore City.

data_themes.description: Geospatial data on environmental issues, land, and resources
Data on roads, infrastructure, and transportation networks
Administrative, planning, and public services data

geotopics.description: Cadastral, land use, and planning data
Environmental, land cover, and natural resource data
